org.hova.hover.sdk.user.services
Class UserServicesResource

java.lang.Object
  org.hova.hover.sdk.user.services.UserServicesResource

public class UserServicesResource
extends java.lang.Object

The class is responsible for posting, getting, updating and deleting data of the user services in the Hover system using the Hover API.

Constructor Summary
UserServicesResource()
           
 
Method Summary
 Response assign(UserService userService)
          Add a user into a service in the Hover system using Hover API or thrown an exception if user is already assigned to it.
 Response get(java.lang.String serviceid, java.lang.String userid, java.lang.String owner)
          Get the user info on a specific phase using the Hover API.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Method Detail

assign

public Response assign(UserService userService)
                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                       java.net.MalformedURLException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       java.lang.Exception
Add a user into a service in the Hover system using Hover API or thrown an exception if user is already assigned to it.

Parameters:
userService - the user services class representing the data to post. The data could be encoded as json format by the SDK
Returns:
a response instance with the http status code and the body decoded as json and in a class translation
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
java.net.MalformedURLException
java.io.IOException
java.lang.Exception

get

public Response get(java.lang.String serviceid,
                    java.lang.String userid,
                    java.lang.String owner)
             throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                    java.io.IOException
Get the user info on a specific phase using the Hover API.

Parameters:
serviceid - the service id assigned to the user. It could be a valid id or the string all for requesting all assigned services.
userid - the user id for which one get the service(s). It's required, not null.
owner - if it is true, then retrieve services as owner, to retieve services assign just send this as 'null'.
Returns:
a response instance with the http status code and the body decoded as json and in a class translation
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException
java.io.IOException
